I am happy to come back to my region, Limousin! #Limoges
You welcomed me 31 years ago, here at #Limoges. I want to express my gratitude. #Limoges
You have brought me what is greatest in a democracy: the legitimacy of suffrage! #Limoges
If the French allow me to be President of the Republic, history will remind that it is at #Limoges that everything began! # FH2012
I am here on a land of fidelity: fidelity to this great idea of ​​socialism! #Limoges
The city of #Limoges was even called in the nineteenth century "The Rome of Socialism"!
We need social partners, we need dialogues between organized forces. #Limoges # FH2012
Labor Day is the holiday of all workers! # 1ermai #Limoges
Never, for a very long time in a campaign, had there been this indispensable unity of the Socialists. # 1ermai #Limoges
I am a candidate from the left, from the left! #Limoges # FH2012
We must put ourselves at the height of France. #Limoges # FH2012
We are not simply an addition of political families. We now carry the interest of France! #Limoges # FH2012
The challenge of this election is to be able to make the rally for the recovery of France in justice! #Limoges # FH2012
The right was sanctioned last Sunday. The candidate-outgoing acts as if he had not seen anything! #Limoges # FH2012
Around him I have the impression that doubt is settling! #Limoges # FH2012
Now it is in the program of the National Front that the candidate-out comes pick! #Limoges # FH2012
So much so that on the side of the humanist right, some are wondering. #Limoges # FH2012
How can one accept that workers, young people, can give their vote to a party that serves the Republic but uses them?
We must not leave anybody behind but remember each time the principles that are ours. #Limoges # FH2012
We want to be France respected because it is the people who will decide its future! #Limoges # FH2012
Meeting with leaders of peasant organizations, to continue the dialogue regarding the agrarian problem. http://t.co/X7dlJNFy
I looked with amusement what had been the campaign of 1981. #Limoges # FH2012
And now, Valéry Giscard d'Estaing supports Nicolas Sarkozy. There would be a union of candidates-out, out! #Limoges
I pledged that France, in the aftermath of the presidential election, will re-establish its public accounts for the five-year period. #Limoges
Is it worthy of an outgoing President to wish there to be more speculation, for the sole purpose of preventing alternation?
In this campaign, I launched the beautiful idea of ​​economic patriotism! #Limoges # FH2012
Patriotism means thinking first of all about the general interest! #Limoges # FH2012

Patriotism is to understand that France is the solution and not the problem! #Limoges # FH2012

We will launch a great plan for very high speed! #Limoges # FH2012
I will create a Ministry of Territorial Equality so that everyone has the same ability to succeed in life! #Limoges # FH2012
How could a power be powerful if it does not have the least respect for civil servants? #Limoges # FH2012
Do we retain enough young researchers in France? Are they given the means? #Limoges # FH2012
I came to tell you my confidence in you! #Limoges # FH2012
I have come to tell you my confidence in the values ​​of the Republic and in the capacity of our country to recover. #Limoges # FH2012
I have confidence in the victory that is coming. She's here, she's coming! #Limoges # FH2012
It's your participation that will make the difference! # 6may #Limoges # FH2012
Never had I heard a candidate-outgoing having a conception of the truth too, how to say, contradictory, comical, hilarious!
That a candidate-outgoing can claim that there was a call of 700 mosques when there was no call ... #Limoges # FH2012
The one who lies is the one who is not sure of himself! #Limoges # FH2012
He who lies is the one who wants to deceive the people and not to enlighten him! #Limoges # FH2012
We, in matters of secularism, we will never back down! #Limoges # FH2012
The big issue of the presidential election is the division or the rally! #Limoges # FH2012
There are no appearances in the Republic, there is only belonging to the Republic! #Limoges # FH2012
I want the victory, if it comes on May 6th, to stay in the minds as strong and as big as the 1981 victory! #Limoges # FH2012
